meanings.definition: situated or lying under the skin
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the subcutaneous layer is right beneath the skin.
meanings.sent2: She received a subcutaneous injection for her medication.
meanings.sent3: The subcutaneous fat seemed to play hide-and-seek under the skin.
meanings.sent4: The subcutaneous world of microbes beneath our skin is like a hidden city.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of subcutaneous warmth after a hot shower is comforting.

meanings.definition: administered or introduced under the skin
meanings.sent1: The nurse carefully administered the subcutaneous vaccine.
meanings.sent2: The subcutaneous insulin injection helped regulate his blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent3: The subcutaneous needle looked like a tiny superhero saving the day under the skin.
meanings.sent4: Her subcutaneous courage to face the needle surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The subcutaneous delivery of the medicine was quick and painless.
